name: House Clear
description:
As a policeman clean the house from the mafia. Pretty straightforward, huh? 

This version is faaar from what i wanted to do, so i am going to work on it soon and hopefully make it full game. If you have some ideas please write them to the comments, and i will try my best to implement them :)

to see devlogs and more stuff please

FOLLOW ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GGS_official_1

CONTROLS:

arrow keys/WASD - Movement

X - Shoot

C - Interact/Melee

(Do you know you can shoot the door? Yeah, it's really true... )

If you encounter any bugs or you liked the game or you just want to write something, feel free to leave a comment ;).
